00035 PcimapQueryWidget::PcimapQueryWidget( WContainerWidget* parent ) : WContainerWidget(parent)
00036 {
00037   parent_ = parent;
00038 
00039   /*
00040    * Header Part for navigation
00041    * @{
00042    */
00043   WContainerWidget *result;
00044   addWidget( result = new WContainerWidget() );
00045   Div *header = new Div(result, "header");
00046   Div *logo = new Div(header, "widgparty");
00047   logo->addWidget( new WText("<p>hari<a>X</a></p>") );
00048   Div *content = new Div(result, "content");
00049   Div *menu = new Div(content, "menu");
00050   WContainerWidget *menulist = new WContainerWidget(menu);
00051   menulist->setList(true);
00052   
00053   WAnchor *aHome;
00054   menulist->addWidget( aHome = new WAnchor("","Home") );
00055   aHome->setRefInternalPath("/home");
00056   WAnchor *aAnalyzeOs;
00057   menulist->addWidget( aAnalyzeOs = new WAnchor("","Analyze OS") );
00058   aAnalyzeOs->setRefInternalPath("/analyze_os");
00059   WAnchor *aQueryDevices;
00060   menulist->addWidget( aQueryDevices = new WAnchor("","Query Devices") );
00061   aQueryDevices->setRefInternalPath("/query_devices");
00062   aQueryDevices->setStyleClass("selected");
00063   WAnchor *aMainboards;
00064   menulist->addWidget( aMainboards = new WAnchor("","Mainboards") );
00065   aMainboards->setRefInternalPath("/mainboards");
00066 
00067   /*
00068     Container 'page' holding contents shown in page apart from the Header Part.
00069     Anything else from the Header to be shown in page is added to 'page' container.
00070   */
00071   Div *page = new Div(content, "pagearea");
00072   /*
00073    * @}
00074    */
00075   
00076 
00077   WTable* layoutQuery;
00078   page->addWidget( layoutQuery = new WTable() );
00079 
00080   layoutQuery->elementAt(0,0)->setColumnSpan(2);
00081   layoutQuery->elementAt(0,0)->addWidget( new WText("Paste below the output of `lspci -mn`:") );
00082   
00083   layoutQuery->elementAt(1,0)->setColumnSpan(2);
00084   layoutQuery->elementAt(1,0)->setContentAlignment(AlignCenter);
00085   // Text area for user input of 'lspci -mn' command.
00086   layoutQuery->elementAt(1,0)->addWidget(pcimapList_ = new WTextArea());
00087 
00088   pcimapList_->resize(450, WLength());
00089   pcimapList_->setFocus();
00090 
00091   layoutQuery->elementAt(2,0)->addWidget( new WBreak() );
00092   layoutQuery->elementAt(3,0)->addWidget(bQuery_ = new WPushButton("Query Devices"));   // 'Query Devices' button
00093 
00094   // Trigger readLspciList() function on 'Query Devices' click.
00095   bQuery_->clicked().connect(this, &PcimapQueryWidget::readLspciList);
00096

00101 PcimapQueryWidget* PcimapQueryWidget::Instance( WContainerWidget* parent)
00102 {
00103   if( parent == 0 ){
00104     if ( !instance_ ){
00105       // we didn't receive a parent and there is no instance of PcimapQueryWidget, so return NULL..
00106       return NULL;
00107     }
00108   }
00109   else{                         // We received a parent container
00110     if( !instance_ ){
00111       instance_ = new PcimapQueryWidget(parent);
00112     }
00113     // else don't care, we already have an instance we will return that.
00114   }
00115   return instance_;
00116 }

00119 
00120 void PcimapQueryWidget::readLspciList()
00121 {
00122   destroyLspciList();           // Destroy previous list!
00123   
00124   char column_count;            // Holding the column number we are currently reading in 'lspci -mn' output.
00125   
00126   
00127   std::string pcimapListContent = (pcimapList_->text()).narrow(); // Put contents of Text area in a string,
00128   std::stringstream ss( pcimapListContent );                      // and convert it to a stream.
00129 
00130   char lspciLine[53];
00131   while( ss.getline(lspciLine, 53) ){                   // Read each line of 'lspci -mn' output
00132 
00133     std::istringstream s_in(lspciLine);                 // Convert the line into a stream.
00134     std::string get_s;
00135 
00136     PciDevice *pci_dev = new PciDevice();
00137     
00138     column_count = 0;
00139     while ( s_in >> get_s ) {                           // Read each column of current line
00140       
00141       switch(column_count) {
00142       case 0:
00143         // std::cout << get_s; // @test
00144         break;
00145         
00146       case 1:
00147         pci_dev->setClass( get_s.substr(1,2) );         // Separate Class and Subclass info from Class column.
00148         pci_dev->setSubclass( get_s.substr(3,2) );
00149         break;
00150         
00151       case 2:
00152         pci_dev->setVendor( get_s.substr(1,4) );
00153         break;
00154         
00155       case 3:
00156         pci_dev->setDevice( get_s.substr(1,4) );
00157         break;
00158         
00159       case 4:
00160         // std::cout << "rev: " + get_s; // @test
00161         
00162         if( get_s.at(1) == 'p' ){       // there might also be Progif info instead of Revision in this column.
00163           pci_dev->setProgif( get_s.substr(2,2) );
00164           ++column_count;               // if so, skip to the SubVendor column.
00165         }
00166         break;
00167         
00168       case 5:
00169         // This column might hold Progif or Subvendor info, so act accordingly
00170         if( get_s.at(1) == 'p' ){
00171           pci_dev->setProgif( get_s.substr(2,2) );
00172         }
00173         else {                          // Prog-if is empty, so there should be the Subvendor column.
00174           if ( get_s != "\"\"" ){
00175             pci_dev->setSubvendor( get_s.substr(1,4) );
00176             ++column_count;
00177           } // else subvendor code is empty..
00178         }
00179         break;
00180         
00181       case 6:
00182         if ( get_s != "\"\"" ){
00183           pci_dev->setSubvendor( get_s.substr(1,4) );
00184         } // else subvendor code is empty..
00185         break;
00186         
00187       case 7:
00188         if ( get_s != "\"\"" ){
00189           pci_dev->setSubdevice( get_s.substr(1,4) );
00190         } // else subdevice code is empty..
00191         break;
00192         
00193       }
00194       ++column_count;
00195     }
00196     lspci_list_.push_back(*pci_dev);    // Populate the device list with the line read.
00197     delete pci_dev;
00198   }
00199 
00200   // Now lets switch to the PcimapResultWidget (Query Devices Result page).
00201   PcimapResultWidget* qresult;
00202   if ( (qresult = PcimapResultWidget::Instance()) == NULL )             // It should not exist!
00203     // so add it to StackedWidget and select, pass the PCI Device list as parameter.
00204     selectWidget( PcimapResultWidget::Instance(lspci_list_,parent_) );
00205   else
00206     WApplication::instance()->log("debug") << "PcimapResultWidget already exists! this should NOT happen!";
00207 
00208   pcimapList_->setText("");
00209   WApplication::instance()->setInternalPath("/query_results");
00210 
00211 }

00214 std::vector<PciDevice>& PcimapQueryWidget::getLspciList()
00215 {
00216   return lspci_list_;
00217 }

00219 
00220 void PcimapQueryWidget::destroyLspciList()
00221 {
00222   int lspci_list_size = lspci_list_.size();
00223   for ( int k=0; k<lspci_list_size; ++k )
00224     lspci_list_.pop_back();
00225 }

00227 
00228 void PcimapQueryWidget::resetAll()
00229 {
00230   pcimapList_->setText("");
00231   destroyLspciList();           // Clear the temporarily stored PCI Device list.
00232 }
